admin-port.description: Admin port. Provides an administrative UI for this instance.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each linkerd instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each linkerd task.

marathon-host.description: DC/OS leader hostname, for Marathon API access.

marathon-port.description: DC/OS leader port, for Marathon API access.

marathon-uri-prefix.description: Marathon API prefix. Typically left blank, or '/marathon'.

secret_name.description: Enterprise Only. Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed. For more information see https://docs.mesosphere.com/1.8/administration/id-and-access-mgt/service-auth/custom-service-auth/
